text: Clifford Herring (13 October 1913 – 1997) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1997 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:English Football League players Category:Ollerton Colliery F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players
title: Clifford Herring
